channel.title: [718/742] Near-Trinity
channel.description:
[center] Links: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/po386ootmrp7o30/Near-Trinity.jar]Client[/url] [url=http://near-trinity.net]Forum[/url]
[/center]
Feature(s):
Thieving: Stalls Pickpocket Rogues' Den
Mining: Living rock cavern Red sandstone (for making flasks) Shooting stars Ores
Godwars (Killcount for the following) - Bandos - Armadyl - Zamorak - Saradomin
Quests - Roving Elves - Dwarf Cannon Quest - Cooks' Assistant
Agility - Wilderness - Barbarian - Gnome
Phoenix boss - Drops infernal ashes (Can spread the ashes for exp... correct animation)
Random - Shops is all one big dialogue handling every shop, and organized via skills, combat etc. - Teleporting is handled in one big dialogue, based off of Bosses, Dungeons, Skilling etc.
Dagannoth kings
Soulwars start (Lobby, and first entering, and graves)
Loadstone teleporting
Zombies Minigame (With points, and cash reward)
livid farms
Matrix Features (AND MORE JUST CBF LISTING)
[center]
[spoiler="Godwars"] [img]http://gyazo.com/6934249e05c91fc17969a87265ce73d9.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/hs9he0.jpg[/img] [/spoiler]
[spoiler="Random"] [SIZE=4](NEW): Flask making![/SIZE] [img]http://i.imgur.com/9D8BkmL.png[/img]
[SIZE=4]Real Quests *Roving elves picture below*[/SIZE] [img]http://i.imgur.com/iTjnj1m.png[/img]
[SIZE=4]Organization:[/SIZE] [img]http://gyazo.com/b3d086c3740d399b90d4ece992fddd7d.png[/img] [img]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/4632/xapi.png[/img]
[SIZE=4]Rogues' Den:[/SIZE] [img]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/608/hhn8.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[SPOILER="Zombie Minigame"] [SIZE=4]Paints whips/Dark bows, depending what you got in inventory[/SIZE] [img]http://i.imgur.com/F7aDua3.png[/img] [img]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/453/jj8o.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER="Bosses"] [SIZE=4]Dagannoth kings:[/SIZE] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OhiaDhj.png[/img]
[SIZE=4]Glacors[/SIZE] [img]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/3189/0xg1.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
Soulwars Start: [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/30lnlw6.jpg[/img]
[/center]
